message.content:
cs.LG, cs.NE, cs.SY, cs.CV, cs.AI. 

The paper introduces a new variant of neural ordinary differential equations (neural ODEs) that is provably stable, which is relevant to machine learning and optimization. The paper also proposes a learning procedure based on optimal control and adjoint sensitivity analysis, which suggests a connection to control theory and optimization. The proposed regularizers are also relevant to optimization. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.LG (Machine Learning), followed by cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing) and cs.SY (Systems and Control). The paper also evaluates the proposed model on non-linear classification and function approximation tasks, which suggests a connection to computer vision (cs.CV) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI).
